item.title: How to make a shop buy ANYTHING?!
item.dc:creator: @xknightpk xknightpk
item.description:
@xknightpk wrote:

In your config files of the source there would be a shops.cfg file. Click it.
You’ll see something like this

Edit the shop you’d like to change by this

Change the sell and buy “there normally 2 2 on shops you can’t buy nor sell” to 1 1

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a shop buy ANYTHING?!
item.dc:creator: @kthillman kthillman
item.description:
@kthillman wrote:

I have these codes in “Shops.java” btw.
I believe it would have something to do with these.
I basically want a shop to BUY ANYTHING and EVERYTHING.

if (!shop.contains(new Item(itemId, 1)) && !generalStore || itemId == 995) { ActionSender.sendMessage(p, "You cannot sell that item to this shop."); return; }
AND

			shop.add(item);
			p.getInventory().deleteItem(itemId, amount);
			p.getInventory().addItem(995, price);
			update();
		} else {
			ActionSender.sendMessage(p, "You cannot sell that item to this shop.");
		}
	}

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a shop buy ANYTHING?!
